experience.title: Coding Apprentice
description: As an apprentice, I explored a new career field and was provided technical training, mentorship, and profesional development.
I implemented a responsive navigation bar for a non-profit organization website by using CSS animation to enhance user experience.
Utilized version control systems such as GitHub to collaboraate efficiently with team members and track projeect progress
Implemented interactive features using JavaScript, enhancing user experience and engagment on live projects

experience.title: Veterinary Technician
description: As a Veterinary Technician, I assisted veterinarians in exams, surgeries and medical procedures.
I monitored anesthesia and vital signs during surgery and dental cleanings.
Collected and prepared blood, urine, and tissue samples for testing.
Educated pet owners on post-treatment care, medication instructions, and preventative health.
